title: Uber launches app to pair freelance workers with jobs
text:
Uber is moving into temping, launching a flexible working app for pairing freelancers with jobs as the company continues the hunt for profits.

The ride-hailing giant confirmed its new app for contractors and shift workers, Uber Works, would launch in Chicago initially.

Uber said the service was aimed at American blue-collar workers such as cooks, warehouse workers, cleaners and event staff, making it easier for them to find shift work.

Workers will not be required to re-enter credentials or qualifications for every new position they apply for, and the companies they work for can better monitor shift times, working patterns and payments. The app will provide information on pay, skills required...
description: Uber is moving into temping, launching a flexible working app for pairing freelancers with jobs as the company continues the hunt for profits.
